# Methods for befriending misnamed monsters
## Where to find creatures
### At Sea
At sea you can expect to find the following environments.
1. Moist
1. Saturated
1. Dark
1. Briny
1. Saline
### On Land
On land you can expect to find the following environments.
- muggy
- swampy
- coastal
- grasslands
- foothills
- mountains
